oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Samuel E Shore interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Shore, Samuel E.; Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Major Ed Shore served February 1968 to March 1969 in the United States Marine Corps. He earned the Silver Star and the Purple Heart in June 1968.
